items.summary: Curate the ops registry from 159 contracts down to the essential-first cap of 100 without losing coverage.
Add OPS-INV-COUNT-001 only after the live registry satisfies the 100-contract cap so the gate is introduced as an enforcing contract instead of a known failure.
Extend the shared debt registry only for missing reviewer-critical Docker contracts that still lack an enforcing implementation.
Track the remaining make wrapper surface rules in the shared debt registry until each target-level rule is enforced by a contract.
